originalText.text:
Venmo Suck....I was hacked. Venmo was quick to action. Then the same guy was able to call into Venmo and hack my account again. It's been a nightmare ever since then. They've blocked my bank. I
Get a new bank account. I initiate the standard bank transfer. The day of completion. They freeze my account saying security risk and stop the transfer. Then I jump through hoops by sending documentation. They unfreeze the account. I repeat the transfer. They do it all over again. This has been going on since late October. They want let me transfer to my PayPal? They've blocked my bank account. I can't send money to friends. There holding my money hostage. I've asked them to close my account and mail me a check. They say they can't do that. I'm waiting on a debit card from them. But after reading the reviews. I may not be able to use that. Can someone help get my money from Venmo?

They say they can't do that. I'm waiting on a debit card from them. But after reading the reviews. I may not be able to use that. Can someone help get my money from Venmo?

originalText.text: I used my Venmo credit card to purchase a large ticket amount. I have it set to pay off the full amount every month. After I confirmed that the money was transferred out of my checking account a waited a couple of days and saw my available credit did not reset. I called up they said your credit is on hold through most of the month of December because I paid such a high amount last month. I was told scammers come out in December. I guess they like to treat good customers like scammers because I was told the computers decision and no one can override it. So my account with Venmo credit card is zero and it will stay that way

originalText.text: I’ve been trying to recover my account due to not having access to my old phone number, I’ve sent them pictures of my documents, but they keep saying that they didn’t receive them or that I sent them in the wrong format even though it’s not true. They kept sending me a link to upload my documents, I attached and sent them documents but they keep saying they didn’t receive them. Believe me I know how to convert images to the JPEG format, attach documents and hit a “submit” button!

Believe me I know how to convert images to the JPEG format, attach documents and hit a “submit” button!

originalText.text: Fraudulent banking practices. Do not trust this service. All of my money is being frozen by venmo for no reason.  I've reached out email and phone  to no avail.  Seeking legal representation now. Do not trust this app.

originalText.text: Was semi useful for small transactions, but Venmo is refusing to allow a larger transactions to go through. The customer service is awful. I finely got someone on the phone and all they said was that they cant do anything for me. So much for being able to pay business and contractors through Venmo!
